document.docAuthor: Ozerov, A. L. & Krivosheina, M. G.
document.masterDocTitle: A review of the genera Cleigastra Macquart, Gonarcticus Becker, Gonatherus Rondani, Hexamitocera Becker, Nanna Strobl, Orthacheta Becker and Spathephilus Becker (Diptera, Scathophagidae) of Russia

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: A review of the genera Cleigastra Macquart, Gonarcticus Becker, Gonatherus Rondani, Hexamitocera Becker, Nanna Strobl, Orthacheta Becker and Spathephilus Becker (Diptera, Scathophagidae) of Russia

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
apicalis
Meigen, 1826
: 236
(
Cordylura
). Type-locality: not given.

subSubSection.paragraph:
Remarks. The species was mentioned by
Gorodkov ( 1986 : 20 )
for the European part of Russia without indicating a specific locality and by
Humala & Polevoi ( 2009 : 71 )
from Karelia; and then recorded in the Russian Far East by
Ozerov & Krivosheina ( 2014 b: 206 )
.

Diagnostic description. Body-length 4.2–7.2 mm . Fore coxa completely yellow, femora yellow in ground color: fore femur yellow, often with black stripe anteriorly, mid and hind femora yellow with black spot apically; male femora with black hairs ventrally. Sternites 4 and 5 as in Figs 20, 17 . Epandrium, cerci and surstyli as in Figs 18, 19 . Ovipositor as in
Figs 14–16
.
